name: Shmupper
description:
Shmupper is a simple shoot'em'up with with power-ups and original enemies, which will make Shmupper a little bit hard. Bullet-hell mechanics included too!

This is the true "indie-game" and yes, it was made in a garage. For now, it is just a prototype of the real game. I hope that the game will be released soon. Here is Shmupper Roadmap for now:

For now, you have only one ship and three lifes. You can't make mistakes often, because the death is there, around the corner. Try to complete the game and not to die!

(Also, there are a couple of bugs, which i will fix in the next update. If you have more bugs found - write me and i will be really thankful!)

Shmupper was created by Volodumyr Chaikovskyi, and this is my first project ever. You can follow my blog right here: Blogger.com. Also, you should follow my Twitter for more information.
